wikipedia_page.main: Herbert Henry Stone (born April 1873) was an English footballer. His regular position was at full back. He was born in St Albans, Hertfordshire. He played for Manchester United and Ashton North End.

response: He made an extensive study of trees, including multiple cell studies in the form of photo-micrographs including a large number of species from the Indian subcontinent. During his time at Warrington, he provided 186 micrographs to Herbert Stone's book The Timbers of Commerce and Their Identification.
